A technique born from their innate ability to expel [[chakra]] from every [[tenketsu]] on their body, a member of the [[Hyūga clan]] can hit their opponent with a blast of chakra that will send them flying away from the user. It was also shown that this technique can be used with pin-point accuracy to target the weak point of a technique exemplified when Neji Hyūga was trapped by [[Kisame Hoshigaki]]'s [[Water Prison Technique]], and was able to dispel it.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 258, page 12</ref>

== Trivia ==
* This technique was first shown when Neji released himself from [[Kidōmaru]]'s [[Spider Web Flower|webs]],<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 193, page 18</ref> but was not named until he used it against a [[White Zetsu Army]] clone.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 524, pages 14-15</ref>
